channel.title: CVE Feed for emrevona -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for emrevona -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-1375|2024-08-02T05:49:10.352Z -- emrevona -- wp%20fastest%20cache
item.description: The WP Fastest Cache plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized cache deletion in versions up to, and including, 1.1.2 due to a missing capability check in the deleteCacheToolbar function . This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level permissions and above, to delete the site's cache.

item.title: CVE-2024-4347|2024-06-04T17:53:52.105Z -- emrevona -- wp%20fastest%20cache
item.description: The WP Fastest Cache plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Directory Traversal in all versions up to, and including, 1.2.6 via the specificDeleteCache function. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers to delete arbitrary files on the server, which can include wp-config.php files of the affected site or other sites in a shared hosting environment.

item.title: CVE-2024-4347|2024-08-01T20:40:46.511Z -- emrevona -- wp%20fastest%20cache
item.description: The WP Fastest Cache plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Directory Traversal in all versions up to, and including, 1.2.6 via the specificDeleteCache function. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers to delete arbitrary files on the server, which can include wp-config.php files of the affected site or other sites in a shared hosting environment.
